content: The Flint Chief fights like a combination of the Flint Vanguard and the other large, glowing rock enemies around the Valley. It does have appendages that it uses to kick or swipe at you, but most of its attacks will be delivered via the creature's huge, lava-infused head. These attacks hit hard, but since the Flint Chief is big, it's also rather slow, giving you enough time to dodge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Chief_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Chief Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Chief Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Flint Chief fights like a combination of the Flint Vanguard and the other large, glowing rock enemies around the Valley. It does have appendages that it uses to kick or swipe at you, but most of its attacks will be delivered via the creature's huge, lava-infused head. These attacks hit hard, but since the Flint Chief is big, it's also rather slow, giving you enough time to dodge.
